page.title: 04OLD PEOPLE IN HIGHAM FERRERS
page.content:
White's Close was opened in 1951 by Mrs John White as residences for old people. The houses were funded by John White's Boot and Shoe Manufacturing Firm which is opposite the Close.
In the pleasant surroundings of the Close there are 3 brick buildings each containing 3 bungalows which are designed for 1 or 2 old people.
In 1985 a problem has developed with vandalism. In this area the residents also feel very vunerable to attack. Despite this the bungalows are warm and cosy and the gardens colourful and well kept.
